0d90ba90-0d5c-4d3c-af88-d799a9c26a93.description: MDE static IP ranges - OPNsense does not support wildcard DNS  - Source: https://azureipranges.azurewebsites.net/

afd6ab87-c669-4e48-8fdd-9186bf430361.name: mde_edrcyberdata
afd6ab87-c669-4e48-8fdd-9186bf430361.description: EDR Cyber Data EU (Mac & Linux) - If not in EU, replace with uk-v20, us-v20 or au-v20.events.data.microsoft.com

eb36f27b-1166-4ee0-9394-30b979eb744b.name: mde_crl1
eb36f27b-1166-4ee0-9394-30b979eb744b.description: CRL - Used when creating the SSL connection to MAPS for updating the CRL - Actual URLs are www.microsoft.com/pkiops/* and www.microsoft.com/pki/*

6c1d98be-5fc0-47dd-8cb0-d87a16ac16d3.name: mde_crl2
6c1d98be-5fc0-47dd-8cb0-d87a16ac16d3.description: CRL - Expands on the existing automatic root update mechanism technology to let certificates that are compromised or untrusted be specifically flagged as untrusted

fb202379-778a-48f9-ae17-670984a9ffc0.name: mde_crl3
fb202379-778a-48f9-ae17-670984a9ffc0.description: CRL  Certificate Revocation Lists - required to validate certificates / Used by Windows when creating the SSL connection to MAPS for updating the CRL
